typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{År} as short,
		Biltype as string,
		Sted as string,
		Drivstoff as string,
		Bestand as integer,
		Date as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	store: 'sqlserver',
	schemaName: 'dbo',
	tableName: '07849',
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED') ~> SQL07849
source(output(
		Dato as date,
		Biltype as string,
		Sted as string,
		Drivstoff as string,
		{Solgte biler} as integer,
		{År} as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	store: 'sqlserver',
	schemaName: 'dbo',
	tableName: '12906',
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED') ~> SQL12906
SQL07849, SQL12906 join(SQL07849@Sted == SQL07849@Sted,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> SlaaSammenData
SlaaSammenData aggregate(groupBy(SQL07849@Sted),
	StedNY = case(
    max(SQL07849@Sted) == "Norge", "Norge",
    max(SQL07849@Sted) == "Kristiansand", "Kristiansand",
    max(SQL07849@Sted) == "Kristiansand (-2019)", "Kristiansand",
    max(SQL07849@Sted) == "Søgne (-2019)", "Kristiansand",
    max(SQL07849@Sted) == "Songdalen (-2019)", "Kristiansand"
)) ~> AggregereStedsnavn
AggregereStedsnavn sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	store: 'sqlserver',
	schemaName: 'dbo',
	tableName: 'Sted',
	insertable: true,
	updateable: false,
	deletable: false,
	upsertable: false,
	recreate: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		StedGammel = Sted,
		Sted = StedNY
	)) ~> StedTabell
